item.title: 欧盟农业负责人表示，南方共同市场协议可能在夏季前获得批准
item.description: 欧盟农业专员克里斯托夫-汉森（Christophe Hansen）周四告诉路透社，欧盟可能在夏季之前批准与南美集团南方共同市场（Mercosur）的贸易协议计划，但欧盟尚未确定批准日期。【原文：The European Union could approve its planned trade deal with South American bloc Mercosur before summer, but it has not yet fixed a date to do so, EU agriculture commissioner Christophe Hansen told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 精灵出来了Interactive Brokers 董事长称 24 小时交易势头强劲
item.description: Interactive Brokers 董事长托马斯-彼得菲（Thomas Peterffy）周四在 Piper Sandler 全球交易所与交易大会上表示，24 小时交易已变得更容易被接受，并称其为难以放回瓶中的精灵。【原文：Interactive Brokers Chairman Thomas Peterffy on Thursday said 24-hour trading has become more acceptable, calling it a genie that is hard to put back into the bottle, at the Piper Sandler Global Exchange & Trading Conference.】

item.title: 特朗普回击盟友马斯克，特斯拉股价下跌
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）是特斯拉公司的首席执行官，自称是唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "第一哥们"，最近几天他加大了对总统大规模税收立法的批评力度。投资者开始注意到这一点。【原文：Elon Musk, CEO of Tesla and self-proclaimed "First Buddy" of President Donald Trump, has stepped up criticism of the president's massive tax legislation in recent days. Investors are starting to notice.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒：通胀面临上行风险，利率应保持不变
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周四表示，只要关税继续威胁通胀，她就支持将美国短期借贷成本维持在当前的 "适度限制性 "水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler on Thursday said she supports keeping short-term U.S. borrowing costs at their current "moderately restrictive" level as long as tariffs continue to threaten to lift inflation.】

item.title: 对市场而言，欧洲央行降息的终点越来越近了
item.description: 由于欧洲央行认为自己有能力应对美国关税政策引发的全球经济不确定性，交易员们对欧洲央行暂停降息的信心与日俱增。【原文：Traders are increasingly confident the European Central Bank will pause its run of interest rate cuts now that the central bank sees itself as well-positioned to deal with global economic uncertainty fuelled by U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: 稳定币公司 Circle 在纽交所首次公开募股时股价将翻一番，为 IPO 市场注入活力
item.description: 周四，Circle Internet 的股票在纽约证券交易所首次上市时将翻一番，有望成为第二大加密货币公司。【原文：Circle Internet's shares were set to double in their market debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, in what is expected to be the second-largest listing by a crypto company.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 是 8 亿美元巴黎办公物业的竞标者之一
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，Blackstone 是几家入围竞标者之一，他们将以 7 亿欧元（8 亿美元）的价格购买巴黎一座拥有逾百年历史的办公大楼，这将是欧洲大萧条后最大的办公楼销售活动之一。【原文：Blackstone is among several bidders shortlisted to buy a more than century-old office block in Paris with a price tag of 700 million euros ($800 million), a source familiar with the matter told Reuters, in what would be one of Europe's biggest post-pandemic office sales.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称欧盟首脑助手加入关税谈判团队以推动美国谈判
item.description: 三位熟悉谈判情况的消息人士称，欧盟已经更换了与特朗普政府进行贸易谈判的团队，引入了一位欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩的亲密助手，以便更迅速地处理技术谈判中出现的政治问题。【原文：The European Union has changed its team locked in trade talks with the Trump administration, bringing in a close aide to European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen to deal more swiftly with political questions arising from the technical negotiations, three sources familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 波音重建信任，航空公司老板看到喷气机质量提高
item.description: 航空公司老板们暂时对波音公司以适当质量交付喷气机的能力表示了更大的信心，这是为结束这家陷入困境的飞机制造商多年来声誉受损而迈出的一步。【原文：Airline bosses are tentatively voicing greater confidence in Boeing's ability to deliver jets at the right quality in a step towards ending years of reputational damage for the embattled planemaker.】

item.title: 部长称澳大利亚是 "安全可靠 "的关键矿产替代国
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）周四表示，面对人们对中国政府在这一领域的主导地位日益增长的担忧，澳大利亚可以为对工业至关重要的关键矿产提供安全的替代供应。【原文：Australia offers a secure alternative supply for critical minerals vital to industry, its trade minister Don Farrell said on Thursday, in the face of rising concerns about Beijing's dominance of the sector.】

item.title: 关税生效后美国铝溢价创历史新高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美国进口金属征收更高的关税后，周四美国消费者在实物市场上购买铝的溢价达到创纪录的每磅60美分或每公吨1,323美元。【原文：Premiums for consumers buying aluminium on the physical market in the United States hit a record 60 cents a lb or $1,323 a metric ton on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump imposed higher tariffs on U.S. imports of the metal.】

item.title: Citadel 首席执行官担心美国违约保险成本上升
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人兼首席执行官肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）周四表示，一种防止美国最终违约的金融工具的定价水平与一些欧洲国家接近，这是 "不可思议的"。【原文：Citadel's founder and CEO Ken Griffin said on Thursday it is "unfathomable" that a financial instrument to protect against an eventual U.S. default is being priced at levels close to some European countries.】

item.title: 中国稀土限制令导致汽车企业面临短缺
item.description: 由于中国对稀土、矿物和磁铁出口的限制，汽车制造商及其供应商正面临着短缺，这一问题已迫使一些汽车制造商关闭了某些车型的生产。【原文：Automakers and their suppliers are facing shortages due to restrictions on Chinese exports of rare earths, minerals and magnets, an issue that has forced some to shut down production of certain models.】

item.title: 白银飙升突破 35 美元/盎司水平，创逾 13 年新高
item.description: 分析师说，在强劲的工业需求和持续供应不足的推动下，白银飙升至每盎司 35 美元的关键里程碑，达到 13 年多以来的最高水平。【原文：Silver has soared to the key milestone of $35 per ounce, reaching its highest level in more than 13 years, propelled by robust industrial demand and ongoing supply deficits, analysts said.】

item.title: 美国 4 月贸易逆差大幅收窄；进口降幅创历史新高
item.description: 美国 4 月份的贸易赤字大幅收窄，进口降幅创下历史之最，这是因为关税前的货物抢购潮减弱，这可能会提振本季度的经济增长。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit narrowed sharply in April, with imports decreasing by the most on record as the front-running of goods ahead of tariffs ebbed, which could provide a lift to economic growth this quarter.】

item.title: 技术总监称欧盟是动荡中数字合作的 "可靠伙伴
item.description: 欧盟技术负责人亨娜-维尔库宁（Henna Virkkunen）周四表示，欧盟将与国际伙伴合作，提高其竞争力并促进基于规则的全球数字秩序，此举旨在抵消与美国之间动荡的关系。【原文：The European Union will work with international partners to boost its competitiveness and promote a rules-based global digital order, EU tech chief Henna Virkkunen said on Thursday, a move aimed at offsetting turbulent ties with the United States.】

item.title: 世界汽车供应链掌握在少数中国官僚手中
item.description: 在北京天安门广场东侧的一栋巨大的灰色建筑里，中国商务部的一个小团队正在决定全球汽车工业的命运，一次决定一个稀土磁铁出口许可证。【原文：In a hulking grey building just east of Tiananmen square in Beijing, a small team in China's Ministry of Commerce is deciding the fate of the global auto industry, one rare earth magnet export permit at a time.】

item.title: 高盛在关税举措后降低风险，为更多不确定性做好准备
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）4月宣布加征关税后，高盛（Goldman Sachs）放缓了风险承担，该华尔街银行的一位高管表示，高盛正准备应对更多的不确定性。【原文：Goldman Sachs has moderated its risk-taking since U.S. President Donald Trump's April tariff announcement, and the Wall Street bank is braced for more uncertainty, a top executive said.】

item.title: 大型央行的预测镜头被美国关税迷雾笼罩
item.description: 白宫难以预测的关税言论及其对货币市场、油价和通胀前景的影响，让全球央行陷入困境。【原文：Unpredictable White House tariff rhetoric and its impact on currency markets, oil prices and the inflation outlook have put central banks across the world in a tight spot.】

item.title: 特朗普税改法案可能给华尔街带来的赢家和输家
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面减税和支出法案即将提交参议院之际，分析家们研究了如果该方案成为法律，他的广泛政策将如何扭转美国公司的命运。【原文：As President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill heads to the Senate, analysts examine how his broad-ranging policies could turn the fortunes of U.S. companies if the package is enacted as law.】

item.title: 美国第一季度工人生产率下滑
item.description: 第一季度美国工人生产率的下降速度比最初想象的要快，在企业已经面临进口商品关税导致成本上升的情况下，劳动力成本急剧上升。【原文：U.S. worker productivity dropped at a faster pace than initially thought in the first quarter, driving labor costs sharply higher at a time when businesses are already facing rising costs from tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 杰克丹尼尔制造商布朗-福尔曼公司预测，关税问题将导致年度收入和利润下降
item.description: 布朗-福尔曼公司（Brown-Forman）周四预测全年收入和利润将下降，因为这家杰克-丹尼尔（Jack Daniel's）的生产商正在关税相关的不确定性中应对疲软的消费支出，这导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了约 14%。【原文：Brown-Forman forecast a decline in annual revenue and profit on Thursday, as the Jack Daniel's maker navigates soft consumer spending amid tariff-related uncertainties, sending its shares down about 14% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数连续第二周上升
item.description: 这些数据表明，在关税带来的经济不利因素不断增加的情况下，劳动力市场状况有所疲软。【原文：The data points to softening labor market conditions amid mounting economic headwinds from tariffs.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，Gucci 所有者开云集团（Kering）正在洽谈出售价值 10 亿美元的第五大道物业股份
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的人士告诉路透社，古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）正在与收购集团 Ardian 就出售其一年多前购买的第五大道著名建筑的股份进行独家谈判。【原文：Gucci owner Kering is in exclusive talks with buyout group Ardian about the sale of a stake in a prestigious Fifth Avenue building it bought just over a year ago, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 贸易战风险下欧洲央行第八次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四一年来第八次降息，承认通胀受到控制，并在与美国爆发贸易战的风险下对欧元区的经济前景变得更加悲观。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates for the eighth time in a year on Thursday, acknowledging inflation was under control and turning more pessimistic about the euro zone's economic prospects amid risks of a trade war with the United States.】

item.title: 自动驾驶初创公司 Plus 将通过 12 亿美元的 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: 自动驾驶卡车初创公司 Plus Automation 周四表示，将通过与空白支票公司 Churchill Capital Corp IX 合并的方式在美国上市，交易金额为 12 亿美元。【原文：Self-driving truck startup Plus Automation will go public in the U.S. through a merger with blank-check firm Churchill Capital Corp IX in a $1.2 billion deal, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛山姆会员店将在年底前去除自有品牌中的合成染料
item.description: 沃尔玛旗下的山姆会员店（Sam's Club）周四表示，将在今年年底前从自有品牌 "Member's Mark "中剔除包括人工色素和阿斯巴甜在内的 40 多种成分。【原文：Walmart-owned Sam's Club said on Thursday it would eliminate over 40 ingredients, including artificial colors and aspartame, from private label brand Member's Mark by the end of this year.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官告诉报纸：梅赛德斯将自己视为关税谈判中的 "传声筒
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰首席执行官奥拉-凯勒纽斯（Ola Kaellenius）周四告诉《法兰克福汇报》，梅赛德斯-奔驰视自己为 "传声筒"，在欧盟与美国的关税谈判中献计献策。【原文：Mercedes-Benz views itself as a "sounding board" that contributes ideas in tariff negotiations between the European Union and the United States, CEO Ola Kaellenius told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung newspaper on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本 30 年期公债上涨，拍卖疲软加剧缩减发行的压力
item.description: 日本 30 年期国债价格上涨，此前一年多来最疲软的国债拍卖增加了大藏省减少超长期国债供应的压力。【原文：Japan's 30-year government bond prices rose after the weakest auction of the securities in more than a year added to pressure on the Ministry of Finance to reduce supply of super-long notes.】

item.title: 品牌老板称玛莎拉蒂即将推出新业务计划
item.description: 陷入困境的豪华汽车制造商玛莎拉蒂负责人周四表示，玛莎拉蒂计划在母公司Stellantis的新任首席执行官安东尼奥-菲罗萨（Antonio Filosa）本月晚些时候正式上任后不久，提交一份新的业务计划。【原文：Maserati plans to present a new business plan shortly, soon after parent company Stellantis' new CEO Antonio Filosa officially starts in his job later this month, the head of the struggling luxury carmaker said on Thursday.】
